Articles.Content:
The goal of this challenge is to build a craft that can be reconfigured on the go to fulfill as many functions as possible. On an intercept trajectory but don’t have enough TWR to get into orbit? Reconfigure the ship so that you do. There’s one catch. You have to keep every part of the craft. Points will be awarded based on versatility and planets it orbited and or landed on. KAS/KIS is allowed but will be scored separately.

Edited December 28, 2017 by ShadowGoat
I can't help but think building a multipurpose craft would just be easier, but then again I lack imagination. Do you have some sort of example?
Sure. Let me make one it’s just like a modular ship that can be reconfigured.
